title: Exclusive Interview with Noam Chomsky
description:
Noam Chomsky of MIT, the world's best known public intellectual and EACPE board member, speaks to Pervez Hoodbhoy (46 minutes). His message: for all its terrible troubles the world is actually getting better.

Please visit this link for English transcript, and Urdu translation of the interview: http://eacpe.org/transcript-of-interview-with-noam-chomsky/

For more videos, articles and other useful posts, visit:
